title: Propagating Plants [How Does Your Garden Grow: Part 2]
creator_credit: George Cass, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Episode 2 of “How Does Your Garden Grow” Series, in which Kevin Heinze shows young students various aspects of gardening using simple techniques suitable for the classroom.
